snippet.title: Signals - Trailer - Out November 16th, 2021
snippet.description:
A relaxing space exploration builder set in a procedurally generated galaxy. A mysterious signal sets you on your way to a nearby system funded by the ALAN Corp. You go from system to system looking for another sign while collecting resources to fund your search.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1661180/Signals/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=launch_trailer&utm_medium=web

http://signals.mkdb.studio/
